text: "Dem Boyz" is the first single from Boyz n da Hood's self-titled debut album. ==Remix== The official remix features verses by rappers T.I. & The Game, an intro by Young Jeezy (sampled from his verse of the original version), Jody Breeze's chorus, a new verse by group member Big Gee, background vocals by Diddy, & an outro by Big Block. An unfinished version of the remix did not have Diddy's vocals, and Big Block's outro was leaked on mixtapes and online prior to the final version's release. ==Chart performance== The song reached number 56 on the Billboard Hot 100, number 15 on the R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs chart, and number 13 on the Rap Songs chart.[ Dem Boyz song information] ==References== Category:2005 debut singles Category:2005 songs Category:Bad Boy Records singles Category:Gangsta rap songs Category:Southern hip hop songs Category:Songs written by Jeezy Category:Trap music songs
title: Dem Boyz (Boyz n da Hood song)
